reviewText: I was a big fan of the TV show and am glad, but not surprised that they've taken it to another level with live shows!  It's great to hear the crew talk about the times they had together and all the half-baked stunts.

this dvd is basically just a clip show dvd with the Nitro Circus crew talking about then best things they've done and there are a few new clips but not like their previous dvds, its a good addition for a person getting into Nitro Circus but if you have the previous dvds you have everything here, so i could only recommend it for really big fans of the crew and to new comers but casual fans will probally want to pass on this release.
